statements: SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM students;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name FROM students WHERE student_class = 'Grade 10';
SELECT last_name, first_name FROM students ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM students WHERE date_of_birth < '2000-01-01';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM students WHERE date_of_birth > '2000-01-01';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_class = 'Mathematics' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM students WHERE student_class = 'Science' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM students WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1995-12-31';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT name, age FROM students ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT grade_level FROM students;
SELECT name, age, grade_level FROM students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT course_name, credits FROM courses ORDER BY credits ASC;
SELECT student_id, name, age, grade_level FROM students WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE credits > 3 ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, name, grade_level FROM students WHERE grade_level = 12 AND age < 18;
SELECT course_name, teacher_name, credits FROM courses WHERE teacher_name LIKE 'Dr.%';
SELECT student_id, name, age, grade_level FROM students WHERE age BETWEEN 18 AND 22 ORDER BY grade_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Students WHERE grade_level = 10;
SELECT course_name FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM Enrollments WHERE enrollment_id = 3;
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM Enrollments WHERE student_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Students WHERE grade_level = 10;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT Students.first_name, Courses.course_name FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id;

SELECT Students.first_name, Students.last_name, Courses.course_name, Enrollments.enrollment_date FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE Students.grade_level > 10;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM students;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses;
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM enrollments;
SELECT grade_id, grade FROM grades;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY last_name DESC, age ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, gender FROM students WHERE age >= 20 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE LENGTH(instructor) > 10;

SELECT students.first_name, courses.course_name, grades.grade FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.course_id JOIN grades ON enrollments.enrollment_id = grades.enrollment_id;
SELECT MAX(grade) as highest_grade, MIN(grade) as lowest_grade FROM grades;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT name, age FROM Students WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM Courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(course_id) AS num_courses FROM Enrollments GROUP BY student_id HAVING num_courses > 3;
SELECT enrollment_id, grade FROM Grades WHERE grade = 'A' AND enrollment_id IN (SELECT enrollment_id FROM Attendance WHERE present = TRUE);
SELECT name, age, grade FROM Students WHERE age > 20
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM Courses WHERE course_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM Enrollments ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC
SELECT grade FROM Grades WHERE grade = 'A' OR grade = 'B' OR grade = 'C'
SELECT date, present FROM Attendance WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
